thread.title: Jennifer Aniston leg-bombs in sexy thigh-high split dress as she arrives for Vanity Fair’s Oscars 2017 after-party… Just like Angelina Jolie’s memorable pose in 2012
thread.title_full: Jennifer Aniston leg-bombs in sexy thigh-high split dress as she arrives for Vanity Fair’s Oscars 2017 after-party… Just like Angelina Jolie’s memorable pose in 2012

author: glittlejohn
title: Jennifer Aniston leg-bombs in sexy thigh-high split dress as she arrives for Vanity Fair’s Oscars 2017 after-party… Just like Angelina Jolie’s memorable pose in 2012
text:
Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments JENNIFER Aniston flashed her sensational pair of long, lean legs as she arrived at the Vanity Fair Oscars after-party in a stunning thigh-high split long dress. 
The Friends star looked gorgeous as she posed with husband Justin Theroux as they arrived at the annual bash, a favourite with winners and guests alike. Getty Images - WireImage 28 Jennifer Aniston looked sensational in her plunging thigh-high split dress at the Vanity Fair bash 
The dress also had a plunging neckline almost down to 48-year-old Jennifer’s navel, but she kept her make-up and accessories simple. 
Her long brown hair was slick and loose down her back and she teamed her sexy frock with simple strappy black sandals and a clutch bag. 
And the pose mimicked Brad Pitt’s ex Angelina Jolie’s memorable leg-bomb at the 2012 Oscars, where she showed off every inch of her pins in a black thigh-split dress. AP:Associated Press She was joined by husband Justin Theroux who looked handsome in his black suit Getty Images - WireImage 28 Angelina Jolie leg-bombed at the Oscars in 2012 
She looked composed as she made her way inside the party after getting emotional as she introduced the In Memoriam segment during last night’s Oscars ceremony. She said: “Whether a Prince leading the musical revolution, or a princess leading a rebellion in a galaxy far far away. AP:Associated Press 28 Katy Perry looked stunning in her thigh-high split bronze dress “Every one was a cherished member of our Hollywood family… as was beloved friend and actor who left us just yesterday, Bill Paxton.” She then broke off to compose herself as she choked up before continuing the introduction and said: “Let us remember their lives and their beautiful work. All were loved, and all will be missed.” PA:Press Association Jessica Alba looked a vision in her baby blue ruffled chiffon dress Getty Images 28 Amy Adams looked very vintage Hollywood in her plunging silver gown 
Jennifer wasn’t the only one flashing her pins, with Katy Perry and Jessica Alba following her lead in their thigh-high split dresses. 
Katy, 32, looked stunning in her shimmery bronze gown which was slashed up to both thighs, her blonde bobbed hair neat and slick, her accessories simple. Getty Images Kate Bosworth looked very Grace Kelly-esque in her sea blue chiffon gown PA:Press Association 28 Diane Kruger bucked the long gown trend in her sexy silver mini dress 
Jessica Alba, who posed with husband Cash Warren on the red carpet, wore a baby blue sleeveless ruffled gown with a split up her left thigh. 
Her hair was pulled back into a slick high ponytail and she matched the dress with silver platform heels and a silver clutch. Rex Features Dakota Johnson arrived in a plunging black gown PA:Press Association 28 Poppy Delevingne looked pretty in her long nude gown 
The red carpet soon started filling up as the creme de le creme of Hollywood left the Dolby Theatre on Hollywood Boulevard. 
Amy Adams looked very vintage Hollywood in her plunging silver gown, her sleek red hair swept to one side in soft waves. PA:Press Association Kate Upton also went for the old school Hollywood look in her low cut blue sequined number Getty Images Reese Witherspoon kept it short and chic in a patterned black dress Getty Images 28 Demi Lovato was a vision in her long lilac feathered frock 
Kate Bosworth appeared to channel Grace Kelly as she swished into the party in a sea blue full-skirted chiffon dress, her hair pinned back in waves, and a smear of red on her lips. OSCARS 2017 WINNERS LIST 
Actor in a Leading Role – Casey Affleck (Manchester by the Sea) 
Actress in a Leading Role – Emma Stone (La La Land) 
Directing – Damien Chazelle (La La Land) 
Actress in a Supporting Role – Viola Davis (Fences) 
Actor in a Supporting Role – Mahershala Ali (Moonlight) 
Adapted Screenplay – Barry Jenkins (Moonlight) 
Writing (Original Screenplay) – Kenneth Lonergan (Manchester By The Sea) 
Animated Feature Film – Zootopia 
Cinematography – Linus Sangren (La La Land) 
Music (Original Song) – City of Stars (La La Land) 
Music (Original Score) – La La Land 
She was joined by friend Diane Kruger, who also flashed her pins in a very unusual short silver dress which showed off her slender frame. Getty Images Isla Fisher looked pretty in canary yellow satin as she arrived with husband Sacha Baron Cohen Getty Images 28 Olivia Munn kept it covered in a long lace red gown 
Other guests demanding the flashbulbs attention included Fifty Shade star Dakota Johnson, who looked very chic in her plunging black gown which was decorated with a long peach belt tied in a huge bow. 
Poppy Delevingne looked very pretty in her plunging nude gown with silver decor and model Kate Upton, who, like Amy and Kate, went old school Hollywood in a plunging blue sequined dress which showed off her impressive curves. Rex Features Heidi Klum showed off her slender frame in a black feathered dress Reuters 28 Minnie Driver opted for an asymmetrical ruffled number 
Reese, like Diane, kept it short as she posed for the cameras in a black patterned dress with long sleeves which she teamed with strappy heels and simple clutch. 
Demi Lovato, who arrived with Joe and Nick Jonas, stood out in her long lilac feathered dress, while Gabrielle Union left very little to the imagination in her blue and black cutaway dress that just about protected her modesty. Getty Images Emily Ratajkowski looked sexy in her plunging silver gown Getty Images 28 Kate Hudson looked very elegant in her chiffon frock 
Isla Fisher looked chic in a strapless canary yellow satin dress as she arrived with husband Sacha Baron Cohen and Olivia Munn bucked the trend to flash the flesh as she wore a long red lace and chiffon dress with long sleeves and a high neckline. PA:Press Association Lily Collins also went for a plunging black frock Getty Images 28 Kate Beckinsale went almost see-through 
Heidi Klum, like Demi, also opted for the feathered look and showed off her slender frame in a figure-hugging black strapless number, while Minnie Driver went for an asymmetrical ruffled blue frock. Getty Images Miranda Kerr looked chic in her grey patterned dress Getty Images Emma Roberts sparkled in her crystal-encrusted frock… Rex Features 28 … as did Adriana Lima 
Emily Ratajkowski looked sexy in her long silver dress which flaunted her assets, while Kate Hudson oozed elegance in a very plunging nude number that trailed behind her. 
Lily Collins also went for a plunging black frock which was slightly see-through and was hemmed with feathers, and Kate Beckinsale had a similar outfit except her sleeves were decorated with black chiffon. Getty Images Rosie Huntington-Whiteley showed off her baby bump in a gorgeous silver gown Rex Features 28 Pregnant Ciara also flaunted her bump in a low cut red velvet number 
There were also two baby bumps getting in on the action as Rosie Huntington-Whitely, on the arm of fiance Jason Statham, showed off hers in a slinky silver dress while singer Ciara showed off hers in a plunging red velvet dress. Getty Images 28 Jessica Biel looked very elegant as she posed with husband Justin Timberlake 
Miranda Kerr looked very elegant in a simple grey patterned dress while Emma Roberts showed off her slender frame in a crystal-encrusted nude gown as did Adriana Lima. 
Jessica Biel looked very elegant in her bronze and white gown as she arrived with husband Justin Timberlake and Alessandra Ambrosio looked every inch the red carpet queen in her strapless satin dress. Getty Images Alessandra Ambrosio oozed red carpet glamour
